'''Developers Skin Pack''' is a [[skin pack]] exclusive to ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', that includes 2 skins featuring Steve and Alex wearing Mojang T-shirts.

== Skins ==
In [[TU46]] and equivalent updates, these skins were also added to the [[Default Skin Pack (Legacy Console Edition)|Default Skin Pack]] {{in|lce}}.
